property.name: fileName
property.description-key: This will be the name of the file that the browser will use to save the file.

property.name: fileMIMEType
property.description-key: This will be the name of the file that the browser will use to save the file.

property.name: fileContents
property.description-key: This should be the base64 content of the file.

property.name: download
property.description-key: Setting this value to true will start the download
